mapper.insert: insert into account_benefit (ab_id, benefit_name, level, icon, upgrade_total, delete_mark, enabled_mark, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, description) values (#{abId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{benefitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upgradeTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deleteMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update account_benefit set benefit_name = #{benefitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upgrade_total = #{upgradeTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, delete_mark = #{deleteMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enabled_mark = #{enabledMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_Id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_Id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ab_id = #{abId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ab_id, benefit_name, level, icon, upgrade_total, delete_mark, enabled_mark, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, description from account_benefit where ab_id = #{abId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and delete_mark = 0

select ab_id, benefit_name, level, icon, upgrade_total, delete_mark, enabled_mark, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, description from account_benefit where delete_mark = 0

select ab_id, benefit_name, icon, level, upgrade_total, delete_mark, enabled_mark, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, description from account_benefit where upgrade_total <= #{account,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and delete_mark = 0 ORDER BY upgrade_total DESC LIMIT 1
select count(0) from account_benefit where delete_mark = 0

select ab_id, benefit_name, icon, level, upgrade_total, delete_mark, enabled_mark, create_date, create_user_Id, create_user_name, modify_date, modify_user_Id, modify_user_name, description from account_benefit where delete_mark = 0 order by level
SELECT ab_id FROM account_benefit WHERE upgrade_total = #{upgradeTotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
